messages.commandNotFound: Please run `headman help` for all available commands.

dataGenerator.noComponentFolderDefined: Please specify the component folder like this: headman data directoryName/componentName
dataGenerator.noSchemaFile: headman can't find the schema file ${fileName}.
dataGenerator.schemaFileCantBeParsed: The schema file ${fileName} can't be parsed.

messages.jsonFileHasInvalidFormat: It seems like the file ${filePath} has an invalid format as headman was not able to parse it.
messages.fileNotFound: Couldn't find file ${filePath}. Is the 'srcFolder' in your .headman.js correct?
messages.fileNotFoundLinkIncorrect: Couldn't find file ${filePath}. Please check that it's linked correctly.

generator.noComponentNameDefined: Please specify a component name like this: headman new directoryName/componentName
generator.unknownError: An unknown error occured when creating ${name}.

messages.htmlValidationFailed: HTML validation failed. Most likely something went wrong with https://validator.w3.org/nu/. Maybe you also ran into rate limiting.
messages.missingEngineAndExtension: Please specify your template engine and extension in .headman.js (key: 'templates.engine|extension', type: String) or as a cli argument (--templates.engine|extension=<String>)
messages.missingEngine: Please specify your template engine in .headman.js (key: 'templates.engine', type: String) or as a cli argument (--templates.engine=<String>)
messages.missingExtension: Please specify the file extension of your components in .headman.js (key: 'templates.extension', type: String) or as a cli argument (--templates.extension=<extension>).
messages.missingSrcFolder: You did not specify the location of your components, therefore headman will use the root folder to look for them. For best performance, please specify the location of your components in .headman.js (key: 'srcFolder', type: String).
messages.noDataSetForVariation: No data defined for variation "${variation}" in ${file}.
messages.nodeEndAndKeysDontMatch: Your NODE_ENV '${nodeEnv}' doesn't match the keys you defined in folders.assets in your .headman.js, so headman is not able to deliver your ${assetType} files.
messages.noNameSetForVariation: No name defined for variation ${i} in ${file}.
messages.renderingTemplateFailed: Rendering ${filePath} failed. Please check that it is linked correctly and that its content is correct ${engine} syntax.

schemaValidator.invalid: Data does not match schema file.

messages.settingEngineFailed: Setting the rendering engine failed. Are you sure the engine defined in your .headman.js is correct?
messages.srcFolderNotFound: The provided srcFolder does not seem to exist.
messages.updatingStarted: A file has been changed, headman is updating the state.
messages.userConfigUnparseable: headman wasn't able to find or parse your config file.
messages.wrongFileType: ${fileName} does not have the correct file type.
